Package org.cyclops.evilcraft.client.render.blockentity

Class RenderBlockEntityBeacon<T extends BlockEntityBeacon>

java.lang.Object
org.cyclops.evilcraft.client.render.blockentity.RenderBlockEntityBeacon<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.client.renderer.blockentity.BlockEntityRenderer<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
RenderBlockEntityEnvironmentalAccumulator
public abstract class RenderBlockEntityBeacon<T extends BlockEntityBeacon> extends Object implements net.minecraft.client.renderer.blockentity.BlockEntityRenderer<T>
EvilCraft's version of a beacon renderer, this allows us to have custom colors and customize other stuff without being dependend on vanilla code
